DOC.brief_title: Vibrational-proprioceptive Resistance Exercise Training Versus Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation Training Elderly People With Muscle Weakness
DOC.criteria: age related muscle weakness age 6585 year inclusion criterias must fullfilled recent hip knee endpprosthesis ( within last 2 year ) , longstanding immobility body mass index great 40 acute thrombosis low extremity ( within last 3 week ) severe articular effusion acute infection know myopathy relevant neurological disease gait disorder ( e.g . poly neuropathy , Parkinson 's disease ) dementia , impaired cognitive ability diseases vestibular system cause vertigo impair balance symptomatic cardio pulmonal disease within last 6 month insufficient treat hypertonia rheumatic disease relevant functional impairment musculoskeletal system cause surgery , trauma degenerative disease pain low extremity ( VAS > 5 ) one criterion applies subject exclude study
